p.span: I had five kites. My kites were as nice as can be.
But my red kite got away. It rose up, up, up, until it seemed like the tip of a pin.
My tan kite got a rip in it. I tried fixing it with tape. But it did not work. I had to toss it.
One of my kites fell in a huge lake. I bet the ducks ate it.
My nicest kite got hit by a jeep. The man did not see it. I yelled, "Stop!" But he did not hear me. He gave it back to me in bits.
I still have one kite left. But I will not fly it. I will not take it out of its box. I will keep it at home where it is safe. And I will ride my bike instead.
